circumstances: Following an uneventful flight from Freetown, the three engine aircraft encountered windshear on final approach to Monrovia, lost height and struck the ground 5 metres before the runway threshold (0.8-1 meter below the runway elevation). The left main gear was torn off and the aircraft slid/rolled for about 300 metres before coming to rest.  All 11 occupants escaped uninjured while the aircraft was damaged beyond repair.
probable_cause: Loss of control on short final after the aircraft encountered windshear.
